title: Roll Back a Failed Game Patch
description: A new game patch has introduced a critical bug causing widespread crashes. The patch must be rolled back immediately.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the high volume of crash reports following the new patch deployment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the correlation between the new patch and the crash reports.

tasks.description: Identify the previous stable version of the game server software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the version number of the last stable build.

tasks.description: Execute a script to revert all game servers to the previous stable version.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully runs the rollback script, and servers begin to stabilize.
